programme.title: Something You Said Last Night
programme.desc: An aspiring writer in her twenties, Ren and her younger sister Siena reluctantly accompany their parents on a family vacation. Siena parties all night long, but the more reserved Ren is left to her own devices.

programme.title: Revival 69: The Concert That Rocked the World
programme.desc: A young concert promoter launches a festival in 1969 to revive the kings of rock 'n' roll and present new bands. John Lennon's performance with the Plastic Ono Band triggers him to leave the Beatles.

programme.title: Humanist Vampire Seeking Consenting Suicidal Person
programme.desc: Young vampire Sasha has a serious problem: she can't kill. Her parents cut off her blood supply, putting her life in jeopardy. Sasha meets Paul, a lonely teen with suicidal tendencies, and they begin a nocturnal quest to fulfill Paul's last wishes.

programme.title: Corner Gas
programme.desc: After an incident leaves the townsfolk puzzled, Karen tries to convince the entire town that she is not actually a crazy cat lady.

programme.title: Corner Gas
programme.desc: Davis is sent to a sensitivity course after making too many blonde jokes.

programme.title: Transplant
programme.desc: Bash and Amira settle into a new environment; while at the hospital Bash helps a worried couple expecting their first child; Dr. Bishop puts Mags to the test by personally evaluating her performance in the emergency department.

programme.title: Undercover Grandpa
programme.desc: A shy young man turns to his grandfather and his grandfather's old war buddies to help him rescue the woman of his dreams from kidnappers.

programme.title: Women Who Rock
programme.desc: As questions of authenticity, control, and feminism arise in the '90s, Sheryl Crow, Missy Elliott, Courtney Love, Tori Amos, and Alanis Morissette make music on their own terms.

programme.title: Gem & Shaz
programme.desc: Two Asian Canadian teenage girls are given one hour at the school dance by their strict immigrant parents and are determined to make the most of it.

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A heartbroken fisherman finds a penguin drifting alone in the ocean, drenched in oil from a spill. He not only rescues the sea creature, but takes it under his wing, finding a sense of joy for the first time in years.

programme.title: Robot Dreams
programme.desc: In 1980s New York City, Dog assembles Robot as a companion, and they become best buddies. On a Labor Day outing to Coney Island, Robot's metal parts rust, and he can't move.

programme.title: Metal Tornado
programme.desc: A research team's experiments with solar energy accidentally create massive magnetic vortexes that destroy everything in their path.

programme.title: Gunda
programme.desc: Filmmaker Victor Kossakovsky captures natural images of cows, chickens, and a pig and its litter.

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: An ex-military man and animal expert must use his special skills to save tourists at the Jurassic World island resort from rampaging, genetically engineered dinosaurs, including the vicious and intelligent Indominus rex.

programme.title: And Just Like That...
programme.desc: Old pals Carrie, Miranda, and Charlotte transition from the friendship they had in their 30s to a more complicated reality of life and friendship in their 50s.

programme.title: Duster
programme.desc: In the 1970s, a getaway driver encounters a tenacious FBI agent who wants to take his crime family down.

programme.title: The First Omen
programme.desc: A woman starts to question her own faith when she uncovers a terrifying conspiracy to bring about the birth of evil incarnate in Rome.

programme.title: Something You Said Last Night
programme.desc: An aspiring writer in her twenties, Ren and her younger sister Siena reluctantly accompany their parents on a family vacation. Siena parties all night long, but the more reserved Ren is left to her own devices.

programme.title: Attila
programme.desc: Filmmaker Stephen Hosier examines how the system failed a 28-year-old schizophrenic who struggled with addiction.

programme.title: The Alto Knights
programme.desc: In the 1950s, New York crime bosses Frank Costello and Vito Genovese vie for control of the streets. Once the best of friends, petty jealousies and a series of betrayals place them on a deadly collision course that reshapes organized crime forever.

programme.title: The Alto Knights
programme.desc: In the 1950s, New York crime bosses Frank Costello and Vito Genovese vie for control of the streets. Once the best of friends, petty jealousies and a series of betrayals place them on a deadly collision course that reshapes organized crime forever.

programme.title: Merry Swissmas
programme.desc: While spending Christmastime with her mother in Switzerland, an architect meets a single father who shows her how to open herself up to love and forgiveness during the holiday season.

programme.title: Once Were Brothers: Robbie Robertson and The Band
programme.desc: The story of a band that went from backing up Bob Dylan to becoming one of the most influential groups of its era.

programme.title: Gem & Shaz
programme.desc: Two Asian Canadian teenage girls are given one hour at the school dance by their strict immigrant parents and are determined to make the most of it.

programme.title: The Secret Garden
programme.desc: Sent to live with her uncle, a young orphan discovers a magical garden of wonder in 1947 England.

programme.title: The Price of Fitting In
programme.desc: A mother's worst nightmare comes true when her teenage daughter begins hanging out with the wrong crowd at school. As her daughter's drug addiction puts a strain on their relationship, she must decide how best to save her daughter.

programme.title: Unsung Hero
programme.desc: David Smallbone moves his family to the United States to search for a brighter future. Struggling to make ends meet, he soon realizes the talents of his children, who go on to become two of the most successful acts in contemporary Christian music.

programme.title: Princes of the Desert
programme.desc: Zodi, a young Berber boy, befriends an orphaned baby camel and together, they journey across the Sahara Desert.

programme.title: The Addams Family 2
programme.desc: Hoping to get closer as a family, Gomez, Morticia and the rest of the Addams clan embark on an adventurous road trip in a hideous and humongous camper.

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the universe, he must prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.

programme.title: Samaritan
programme.desc: Young Sam suspects that his mysterious and reclusive neighbor is actually Samaritan, a superpowered vigilante who disappeared years ago. With crime now on the rise, Sam makes it his mission to coax Samaritan out of hiding to save the city from ruin.

programme.title: We Grown Now
programme.desc: In 1992 best friends Malik and Eric traverse the city of Chicago, looking to escape the mundaneness of school and the hardships of growing up in public housing. They soon find their unbreakable bond challenged when a tragedy shakes their community.

programme.title: The Return
programme.desc: After 20 years away, Odysseus washes up on the shores of Ithaca. The king finds much has changed since he left to fight in the Trojan War. No longer the mighty warrior his people remember, Odysseus must face his past to save his family.

programme.title: Akilla's Escape
programme.desc: A drug dealer finds his moral code challenged when he interrupts an armed robbery and captures one of the gang members who is a 15-year-old boy.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: Hoping for a record score, Rick runs the last of Rally Valley's pay dirt; Tony's son Mike battles an old water pump to get on Paradise Hill's gold; Parker's crew races to rescue a rock truck hanging off a berm.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 10 Aggies welcome the No. 5 Crimson Tide to Reed Arena for an SEC showdown. Alabama leads the series 14-11 following a 100-75 victory in Tuscaloosa last season. Texas A&M is 8-0 at home in 2024-25 after routing Texas 80-60 on Jan. 5.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: SEC heavyweights in the No. 4 Crimson Tide (14-3, 3-1) and No. 8 Wildcats (14-3, 3-1) trade blows in the Bluegrass State. Kentucky comes off victories over Top 25 teams Mississippi State and Texas A&M. The 'Cats toppled the Tide 117-95 last season.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 3 Crimson Tide (19-3, 8-1 SEC) roll into this matchup with the Razorbacks (14-8, 3-6). Alabama has won five of six meetings since 2020-21, taking down Arkansas 92-88 last season. The Crimson Tide are riding a five-game winning streak.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: History is made as the No. 1 Tigers visit the No. 2 Crimson Tide. This marks the first time in SEC history that the No. 1 and No. 2 teams will face off in the same game. Alabama has won seven in a row, while Auburn has won 15 of its past 16 overall.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 17 Wildcats (18-8, 7-6 SEC) look to take advantage of the reeling No. 4 Crimson Tide (21-5, 10-3). Alabama followed up a loss to No. 1 Auburn by dropping a 110-98 decision to No. 15 Missouri on Feb. 19. Kentucky is 2-5 on the road in 2024-25.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 6 Crimson Tide face the No. 24 Bulldogs. Alabama rebounded from its first two-game skid of 2024-25 by beating then-No. 17 Kentucky on Feb. 22. Chris Youngblood scored 23 points in Bama's seventh straight win over Mississippi State on Jan. 29.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: SEC heavyweights duke it out as the No. 5 Volunteers (23-5, 10-5) host the No. 6 Crimson Tide (23-5, 12-3). Alabama comes off an emphatic 111-73 victory over No. 24 Mississippi State behind a season-high 27 points by senior guard Chris Youngblood.

The first responders face a series of emergencies such as a skating mishap, a self-driving car accident and a warehouse robot gone rogue; Eddie's fight club becomes unruly; Hen encounters difficulties with her and Karen's relationship.

The 118 confronts two dangerous situations where an apartment building is damaged by a meteor shower and a hazardous waste truck crashes; Hen's guilt over the ambulance accident continues to weigh heavily upon her; Bobby helps Eddie.

A little girl becomes trapped inside a runway hot air balloon while the city's power goes out due to a tree-trimming truck that was stolen; Athena's life is endangered while she continues to investigate the case of a serial rapist.
The 118 deals with the chaos that ensues from a large train derailment.

A city bus crashes into a building multiple stories in the air after the Hollywood Reservoir dam breaks; Maddie searches for a trapped cyclist in need of rescue; Bobby contemplates whether Athena is truly ready to return to field work.

Massive mudslides cause destruction across Los Angeles in the wake of a dam break, which leaves an agoraphobic woman stranded in her collapsed home and Buck and Chimney in charge of saving several pregnant women caught in a submerged house.

A man is held hostage by his automated smart home while a yoga teacher loses her vision; Athena pursues a bank robber who is disguising himself; Buck shares something personal with Maddie; some of the 118 get ready for an out-of-state mission.

A man becomes trapped underneath a large car; a garage band gets dangerously enthusiastic; Michael notices his neighbors acting peculiarly and decides to become an amateur sleuth to learn why; Hen's mother announces she is moving to Los Angeles.

A drunk driver sends the team responding to a freeway pile-up that has killed multiple people caught in it; Maddie starts the beginning stages of labor; Hen and Karen try getting their foster daughter ready to meet her birth mother.

Several calls involving parents and their children come in, including a birthday party that goes horribly awry; May discusses her previous suicide attempt to Athena and Michael; Chimney and Maddie get used to their life with a newborn child.

The team rescues an imperiled social media influencer at the sauna before moving on to a reality show wedding and a tragic mother-daughter hiking trip; Maddie worries about missing time with Jee-Yun; May doubts Athena's choices.

When the 9-1-1 call center goes up in flames, the 118 rushes to the rescue; Bobby risks his life to save May and Claudette; Buck and Eddie help an injured electrician; Chimney and his brother work side-by-side as firefighters for the first time.

Hen and Chimney put their lives on the line to prove that someone is playing at making themselves out as a hero, even when it leads to deaths; Eddie goes to Texas and tries to reconcile with his father.

The crew rushes to a cliffside wellness retreat after the guests there turn on their guru, before going on to an emergency call at a fancy hair salon; Maddie thinks about coming back to work; Eddie and May make major life choices.
